snippet: Tom Seaver, who took no-hitters into the ninth inning three times, said he was glad that the Mets’ first no-hitter was “off the table now.”
abstract: Former New York Mets pitcher Tom Seaver, who took no-hitters into the ninth inning three times for the team, praises Mets ace Johan Santana and says he is happy that their first no-hitter is off the table and no longer a topic of conversation.
lead_paragraph: Tom Seaver, who took no-hitters into the ninth inning three times, said he was glad that the Mets’ first no-hitter was “off the table now.”

headline.seo: Tom Seaver Takes Pride in Johan Santana’s No-Hitter
headline.main: A Met Who Came Close, Seaver Praises Santana
headline.print_headline: A Met Who Came Close, Seaver Praises Santana
